en.stPresetConverterDesc: Convert between Markdown and JSON formats for SillyTavern presets
en.stPresetConverterLongDesc: This tool helps you convert between Markdown format and JSON format for SillyTavern presets, making preset creation and editing much easier with external editors.
en.vsCodeSetupDesc: This tool is designed to help users write Silly Tavern presets using external editors like VS Code. Please follow these steps to set up your VS Code environment:
en.extensionsDesc: Please install the following extensions in VS Code:
en.settingsDesc: Add the following configuration to your VS Code settings.json:
en.usageStep1: Convert JSON format presets to MD format
en.usageStep2: Edit the generated MD file in VS Code with section folding and highlighting
en.usageStep3: After editing, convert the MD format back to JSON format
en.noteFormat: The tool uses §§§ as the start marker and @@@ as the end marker for the folding format.
en.pasteOrWrite: Paste Markdown content or write directly...
en.resultWillShow: The converted JSON will be displayed here...
en.mdResultWillShow: The converted Markdown will be displayed here...

zh.stPresetConverterDesc: 在Markdown和JSON格式之间转换SillyTavern预设
zh.stPresetConverterLongDesc: 这个工具可以帮助你在Markdown格式和JSON格式之间转换SillyTavern预设，让你能够使用外部编辑器更轻松地创建和编辑预设。
zh.vsCodeSetupDesc: 本工具旨在方便用户使用外部编辑器(如VS Code)编写Silly Tavern预设。请按照以下步骤配置您的VS Code环境：
zh.extensionsDesc: 请在VS Code中安装以下扩展：
zh.settingsDesc: 在您的VS Code settings.json中添加以下配置：
zh.usageStep1: 将JSON格式的预设转换为MD格式
zh.usageStep2: 在VS Code中编辑生成的MD文件，享受分段折叠和高亮功能
zh.usageStep3: 编辑完成后，将MD格式转换回JSON格式
zh.noteFormat: 工具采用§§§作为开始标记，@@@作为结束标记的折叠格式。
zh.pasteOrWrite: 粘贴Markdown内容或者直接编写...
zh.resultWillShow: 转换后的JSON将显示在这里...
zh.mdResultWillShow: 转换后的Markdown将显示在这里...
